article.name: Ball Animation
article.description:
I saw, I copied, I conquered... I think.
I do alot of thinking. One day, D. Levy sent me this link to a very cool flash based website, which had embedded movie clips linked into flash. I liked it alot. I thought, \"can I embed a set of movies together in flash?\"... then I realised I didn\'t have any movies...
... so I opened up 3D Studio Max, rendered myself some animations of a silver ball doing stuff... imported it all to Flash, keyframed everything together, and hey presto, a sweet flash movie that I can be proud of.
article.keywords: ball, silver, flash, animation, movie, embed, embedding, 3d, studio, max, 3ds, 3dsmax.
